forum.name: Question the Author
forum.intro:
Read the following Project CRISS article Questioning the Author.  Think of a text you have used with your adult learners and go through the text, identifying questions that you might ask the author. Be sure to use the types of questions that are on TEAL fact sheet no. 12, Deeper Learning through Questioning. Then, in the discussion forum, post a brief description of the text and the kinds of author questions you might use. After you’ve posted, read the responses of other course participants.

Click below on "Add a discussion topic" to share your ideas.
